casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Harry L. FULLER. No. 93P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 24, 2004. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of February 2004 by Petitioner to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of June 2004."

*566
